title: Distorted decorative font
content:
Hello

Does anyone know the name of this font...?

Thank you

 ![](http://web.archive.org/web/20080324121648im_/http:/typophile.com/files/chicago_6476.jpg)

 [‹ SUPERMARKET / LAS VEGAS SCRIPT?](http://web.archive.org/web/20080324121648/http:/typophile.com/node/43449 "Go to previous forum topic") [47 new lead character sets printed ›](http://web.archive.org/web/20080324121648/http:/typophile.com/node/43444 "Go to next forum topic")
author: misalion

comments.content: Or get the authorized, improved version direct from [Fontalicious at Font Bros](http://web.archive.org/web/20080324121648/http:/www.fontbros.com/cgi-bin/commerce.cgi?preadd=action&key=FOLI-ALSU).

EDIT: Oh, wow, didn’t know that. Thanks for this info.
